problem.title: Immigration paperwork is overwhelming
problem.item1: Hours spent on repetitive data entry across multiple forms
problem.item2: Costly RFEs due to missed fields and inconsistent information
problem.item3: Manual case status tracking wastes valuable billable hours

solution.title: EZMig automates and validates
solution.item1: Enter data once, auto-populate across all related forms
solution.item2: Real-time validation catches errors before submission
solution.item3: Automatic USCIS status tracking and instant notifications

carousel.title: Everything you need to manage immigration cases.
carousel.contentDescription: Automate form filling, track case progress, and manage client documents all in one place. EZMig handles the complexity so you can focus on your clients.

features.title: Everything you need to manage immigration cases
features.subtitle: From form completion to case tracking, EZMig handles it all.

forms.title: USCIS Forms Made Easy
forms.description: Complete I-130, I-485, I-589, I-765, and I-539 forms with intelligent auto-fill and real-time validation. Never miss a required field again.

clients.title: Client & Case Management
clients.description: Organize all your immigration cases in one place. Track deadlines, manage documents, and keep clients informed automatically.

eFiling.title: e-Filing Ready
eFiling.description: Generate USCIS-compliant PDF packages ready for electronic filing. Save hours on every case submission.

tracker.title: Case Status Tracker
tracker.description: Automatic USCIS case status monitoring. Get instant notifications when case statuses change.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Context-aware AI helps clients fill forms correctly. Reduces back-and-forth and RFEs dramatically.

evidence.title: Dynamic Evidence Manager
evidence.description: Smart evidence checklist adapts to each case type. Never forget a supporting document again.

howItWorks.title: Four simple steps to immigration success
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to complete, validate, and file your cases.

step1.title: Create Client Profile
step1.description: Add client information once. EZMig auto-populates across all related forms. Upload supporting documents and we'll organize them automatically.

step2.title: Complete Forms
step2.description: Fill USCIS forms with intelligent assistance and real-time validation. Our AI catches errors before they become RFEs.

step3.title: Review & Validate
step3.description: Our smart validation checks every field against USCIS requirements. Get instant feedback on missing information or inconsistencies.

step4.title: Generate & File
step4.description: Export USCIS-ready PDF packages or submit directly through e-Filing. Include all supporting documents in the correct order.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you use. 1 credit = 1 completed form.

testimonials.title: Trusted by immigration attorneys
testimonials.subtitle: See what legal professionals say about EZMig

items.quote: EZMig reduced our I-130 processing time by 70%. The error detection alone has saved us countless RFEs. My paralegal can now handle twice the caseload.
items.name: Maria Gonzalez

items.quote: Finally, a system that understands immigration law. The smart form validation catches issues before submission. Essential tool for any serious practice.
items.name: James Chen
items.designation: Partner at Chen & Associates, Los Angeles CA

items.quote: The AI assistant helps my clients fill forms correctly the first time. Game changer for my solo practice. I've doubled my case capacity without adding staff.
items.name: Sarah Williams

items.quote: e-Filing ready documents directly to USCIS format? I didn't think it was possible. EZMig delivers exactly what immigration attorneys need.
items.name: David Park

cta.title: Trusted
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of immigration attorneys who save hours every week with EZMig.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers about automating USCIS workflows, validation and compliance.

items.title: How does EZMig reduce RFEs?
items.subtitle: Real-time validation on USCIS forms
items.answer: We validate required fields, cross-check related answers, and flag risky patterns (like missing joint sponsors) before you export or file. Firms using EZMig report fewer RFEs on I-130/I-485 packages.

items.title: Can clients fill forms themselves?
items.subtitle: Client portal with AI guidance
items.answer: Yes. Invite clients to a secure portal where AI-guided prompts help them fill intake and form data correctly the first time. You keep full control to review and lock sections before filing.

items.title: Do you track USCIS case status?
items.subtitle: Automatic status monitoring
items.answer: EZMig pings USCIS for status changes and sends notifications to you and the client. Deadlines and follow-ups can be tied to status updates to keep cases moving.

items.title: How is data secured?
items.subtitle: Encryption and audit trails
items.answer: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Role-based access, per-action audit trails, and SOC2-aligned controls keep sensitive immigration data protected.

footer.description: Immigration Case Management Made Simple. Complete USCIS forms in minutes, not hours. Trusted by attorneys nationwide.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using EZMig's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: EZMig provides immigration case management software, including form automation, case tracking, and document management tools for immigration attorneys and law firms.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid services are billed according to the pricing plan selected. Tokens are non-refundable once purchased. Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of EZMig are owned by us and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: EZMig shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our services.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through our platform.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@ezmig.com.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including name, email, law firm details, and case information. We also collect usage data and device information automatically.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and ensure platform security and compliance.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with service providers who assist in operating our platform, subject to confidentiality agreements.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, access controls, and regular security audits to protect your information.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also request data portability or object to certain processing activities.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our platform.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@ezmig.com.

relationship.description: Select the relationship between you (the petitioner) and the person you are filing for (the beneficiary).

inProceedings.label: Has the beneficiary ever been in immigration proceedings?
inProceedings.helpText: This includes removal, exclusion, rescission, or deportation proceedings.

processingChoice.title: Processing Information
processingChoice.description: You MUST select either Option 61 or Option 62, but NOT both.

processingType.label: How will the beneficiary obtain permanent residence?
processingType.helpText: Select adjustment of status if the beneficiary is in the U.S., or consular processing if they are abroad.

options.adjustment: Adjustment of Status in the United States (Item 61)
options.consular: Immigrant Visa at a U.S. Embassy/Consulate Abroad (Item 62)

consulateCity.label: U.S. Embassy or Consulate City
consulateCity.helpText: Enter the city of the U.S. Embassy or Consulate where the beneficiary will apply for the immigrant visa.

consulateCountry.label: U.S. Embassy or Consulate Country
consulateCountry.helpText: Enter the country of the U.S. Embassy or Consulate.

inRemovalProceedings.label: Is the beneficiary currently in removal, deportation, or rescission proceedings?
inRemovalProceedings.helpText: Indicate if the beneficiary is currently in any removal, deportation, or rescission proceedings.

previouslyInUS.label: Has the beneficiary ever been in the United States?
previouslyInUS.helpText: Indicate whether the beneficiary has ever been physically present in the United States.

arrested.label: Has the beneficiary ever been arrested, cited, charged, or convicted of any crime?
arrested.helpText: Indicate if the beneficiary has ever been arrested, cited, charged, or convicted of any crime anywhere in the world.

previouslyApplied.label: Has the beneficiary previously applied for permanent residence?
previouslyApplied.helpText: Indicate if the beneficiary has ever previously applied for or received permanent resident status in the U.S.

workedWithoutAuth.label: Has the beneficiary ever worked in the United States without authorization?
workedWithoutAuth.helpText: Indicate if the beneficiary has ever worked in the United States without proper employment authorization.

additionalDetails.label: If you answered "Yes" to any question above, provide details
additionalDetails.placeholder: Provide details about any "Yes" answers above...
additionalDetails.helpText: If you answered "Yes" to any of the questions above, provide complete details here.

statement.title: Petitioner's Statement, Contact, and Signature
statement.description: Select the appropriate statement and provide your contact information.

canReadEnglish.label: I can read and understand English, and I have read and understand every question and instruction on this petition.

options.yes: Yes, I can read and understand English

canReadEnglish.helpText: Select whether you can read and understand English without assistance.

interpreterLanguage.label: Language of the interpreter
interpreterLanguage.helpText: Enter the language used by the interpreter who assisted you.

preparerUsed.label: Did someone other than you prepare this petition?
preparerUsed.helpText: Indicate whether an attorney, accredited representative, or another person prepared this petition for you.

daytimePhone.label: Petitioner's Daytime Telephone Number
daytimePhone.helpText: Enter a phone number where you can be reached during business hours.

email.label: Petitioner's Email Address
email.helpText: Enter an email address where USCIS can contact you.

interpreter.title: Interpreter's Contact Information
interpreter.description: Complete this section only if an interpreter assisted the petitioner.

interpreterBusinessName.label: Interpreter's Business or Organization Name
interpreterBusinessName.helpText: Enter the interpreter's business or organization name, if applicable.

interpreterPhone.label: Interpreter's Daytime Telephone Number
interpreterPhone.helpText: Enter the interpreter's daytime phone number.

interpreterLanguage.label: Language Interpreted
interpreterLanguage.helpText: Enter the language interpreted during the completion of this form.

preparer.title: Preparer's Contact Information
preparer.description: Complete this section only if someone other than the petitioner prepared this petition.

preparerBusinessName.label: Preparer's Business or Organization Name
preparerBusinessName.helpText: Enter the preparer's business or organization name, if applicable.

preparerPhone.label: Preparer's Daytime Telephone Number
preparerPhone.helpText: Enter the preparer's daytime phone number.

isAttorney.label: I am an attorney or accredited representative.
isAttorney.helpText: Check this box if the preparer is an attorney or accredited representative.

onboarding.howWillYouUse: How will you use the platform?

agencyForm.title: Agency information
agencyForm.subtitle: Complete the basic details to get started

freelancerForm.title: Professional profile
freelancerForm.subtitle: Complete your information to appear in the directory

rightPanel.headline: Automate your legal practice
rightPanel.description: Fill immigration forms with precision and full compliance in less time

typeSelector.title: Agency Type
typeSelector.description: Select the type of services your agency offers

law_firm.title: Law Firm
law_firm.description: We can represent clients before USCIS and immigration courts

immigration_services.title: Immigration Services
immigration_services.description: We help complete immigration forms (no legal representation)

form.subtitle: Complete all the required fields to register your agency
form.requiredNote: Fields marked with * are required. Your progress is saved automatically.
